rdf:Description.dc:title: The Bowden Institution, Innisfail, Alberta 1950
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Dept. of the Attorney General.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The first commitments ... were received on April 2nd, 1951. Though facilities were primitive as compared with present standards..."--P. 1.
University of Alberta copy in the Prairie Provinces Collection.
